metadata.title: CVE-2024-34506 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in includes/specials/SpecialMovePage.php inMediaWiki before 1.39.7, 1.40.x before 1.40.3, and 1.41.x before 1.41.1. Ifa user with the necessary rights to move the page opens Special:MovePagefor a page with tens of thousands of subpages, then the page will exceedthe maximum request time, leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
